thread.title: This Clip of Harper Beckham Reading Her Dad a Bedtime Story Is Too Cute to Put Into Words
thread.title_full: This Clip of Harper Beckham Reading Her Dad a Bedtime Story Is Too Cute to Put Into Words

author: Monica Sisavat
title: This Clip of Harper Beckham Reading Her Dad a Bedtime Story Is Too Cute to Put Into Words
text:
David Beckham Instagram Video of Harper Reading January 2017 Harper Beckham Reading Her Dad a Bedtime Story Is Too Cute to Put Into Words February 4, 2017 A video posted by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 3, 2017 at 11:55am PST 
Harper Beckham is growing up so fast! On Friday, David shared a precious Instagram video of his 5-year-old daughter reading him a bedtime story. In the clip, Harper can be heard sounding out words in her adorable British accent while sitting by her dad's side. "Bedtime reading ‚ù§üíú‚ù§ sweet dreams üòç," David captioned the video. Of course, this isn't the first time we've gotten a glimpse of their close family bond . Just last week, Victoria shared a snap of her husband and their four kids , Brooklyn, Cruz, Romeo, and Harper, all huddled together in a big group hug. So cute! Related:
